# dava-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                               | Type                     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------- |
| `active`     | `active`     | If true, the button element will be shown as being active | `boolean`                | `undefined` |
| `appearance` | `appearance` | The base styling to apply to the button.                  | `"default" \| "outline"` | `'default'` |
| `disabled`   | `disabled`   | Set if the button is disabled.                            | `boolean`                | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description                                       | Type               |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `davaBlur`  | Callback to be called when the button loses focus | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `davaClick` | Callback to be called when the button is clicked  | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `davaFocus` | Callback to be called when the button has focus   | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description |
| -------- | ----------- |
| `"base"` |             |
